## Professional Summary
Passionate developer with over 2+ years of experience in building responsive web applications. Proficient in Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase and skilled in various frameworks including React.js, Next.js and Strapi.

## Projects

### Housing First Minnesota Project
A leading trade association for residential builders, remodelers, developers, and building industry suppliers in Minnesota. The project focused on uniting the housing industry through advocacy for housing and homeownership.
**Technologies**: Next.js, MongoDB, Firestore, RESTful APIs

### Gemini Web Application
Web application development project for Gemini, a manufacturing company. Full-stack web development with modern UI/UX design.
**Technologies**: Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Bootstrap

### Lost and Found Application
Currently developing a Lost and Found application designed to facilitate the reporting and reclaiming of lost items in various environments, such as airports, schools, and hospitals.
**Technologies**: Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Bootstrap

### Housekeeping Application
Cutting-edge housekeeping application that revolutionizes task management within companies, offering a streamlined and transparent workflow tracking system.
**Technologies**: Node.js, Express.js, React.js, MongoDB, Git, Firebase
